name: Speeddrasil
description:
You are a soul from Hel fleeing Jörmungand's Maw. You will be fleeing throught some of the Nine realms running on Yggdrasil roots. The goal is to reach Asgard realms.
Game Artist : Emilien Amouyal, Léonie Claude, Andrea Garcia, Filia Haberstich, Stéphane Martin, Amandine Tardif
Concept Artist : Martin Delaur
Sound Designer : Tristan Le Bozec
Game Developper : Guillaume Aubineau, Denis Goossens, Clément Seel
